attrs.flag_descriptions: The input spectrum to the atmospheric correction neural net was out of the scope of the training range and the inversion is likely to be wrong	The input spectrum to the atmospheric correction neural net out of training range	One of the inputs to the IOP retrieval neural net is out of training range	High downwelling transmission is indicating cloudy conditions	One of the IOPs is out of range	Apig output of the IOP retrieval neural net is at its maximum.
